title: Gottlieb – All Ball - Doug's NBA Finals breakdown, Lakers' dysfunction, Free agency; Rockets' reset with NBA writer Henry Abbott
itunes:title: Gottlieb – All Ball - Doug's NBA Finals breakdown, Lakers' dysfunction, Free agency; Rockets' reset with NBA writer Henry Abbott
description:
Subscribe here to the All Ball with Doug Gottlieb Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/all-ball-with-doug-gottlieb/id1358843497?mt=2.  This week, Gottlieb breaks down the NBA Finals ahead of Game 1, and talks Finals, Lakers dysfunction, free agency, Kawhi/MJ comparisons, and a possible Rockets roster rebuild with Henry Abbott from True Hoops. Download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts:

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
